introText: Today's digest covers Meta's AR eyewear and streaming initiatives, Apple's iPhone 17 lineup and related hardware tests, and the latest AI and chip funding. It also highlights political developments in the U.S. and Europe, major crime and security stories, sports results, and cultural reporting. The articles come from The Verge, TechCrunch, Hacker News, The New York Times, NRC, NOS, 9to5Mac, Axios, and others.

articles.title: I regret to inform you Meta’s new smart glasses are the best I’ve ever tried
articles.summary: The Verge reviews Meta’s Ray-Ban Display glasses, priced around $800, evaluating the built-in display’s usefulness for directions, imagery, translations, and overlays, plus comfort and battery life.

articles.title: Apple iPhone Air review: statement piece
articles.summary: Verge discusses the iPhone Air as a design-oriented option within Apple’s lineup, weighing design language, ecosystem integration, and expected trade-offs in battery and camera performance.

articles.title: Meta Connect 2025: the 6 biggest announcements
articles.summary: A roundup of six anticipated announcements at Meta Connect 2025 across hardware and software, with emphasis on eyewear updates and platform strategies.

articles.title: The iPhone 17 is the one to get this year
articles.summary: Verge verdict: the iPhone 17 offers the best balance of features and price in Apple’s 2025 lineup, with emphasis on battery life, camera, software, and ecosystem integration.

articles.title: The iPhone 17 Pro is a bold redesign but a basic upgrade
articles.summary: The iPhone 17 Pro is a design-forward upgrade with incremental performance gains and a premium price, appealing to enthusiasts more than casual users.

articles.title: Ray-Ban’s website posts a “We’ll be back soon” note ahead of Meta Connect
articles.summary: Ray-Ban’s site displayed a “We’ll be back soon” message ahead of Meta Connect, signaling expected announcements and generating anticipation.

articles.title: Microsoft is giving Notepad free AI features
articles.summary: Microsoft adds free AI features to Notepad (summarize, write, rewrite) using local AI models; rollout to Copilot Plus PC users and Windows Insiders; privacy considerations discussed.

articles.title: Meta is bringing an all-in-one movie and TV streaming hub to Quest headsets
articles.summary: Meta plans a unified streaming hub on Quest to simplify VR media consumption, with considerations for app support and performance.

articles.title: Meta unveils new smart glasses with a display and wristband controller
articles.summary: Meta introduces a new generation of smart glasses featuring a built-in display and a wristband controller for hands-free AR interaction, with discussions of specs and use cases.

articles.title: Airbuds is the music social network Apple and Spotify wish they had built
articles.summary: Airbuds is presented as a music-focused social network, exploring its concept, potential ecosystem integrations, monetization, and early traction.

articles.title: Meta launches Hyperscape, technology to turn real-world spaces into VR
articles.summary: Hyperscape enables VR experiences in real-world spaces, with applications in events, retail, and entertainment, plus privacy considerations.

articles.title: India leads the way on Google’s Nano Banana with a local creative twist
articles.summary: India pioneers local adaptations of Google’s Nano Banana concept, affecting regional content ecosystems and Google’s strategy in India.

articles.title: Meta unveils its new Oakley Meta Vanguard smart glasses for athletes
articles.summary: Oakley Vanguard glasses tailored for athletes with enhanced display and potential performance-tracking features, including market positioning and availability.

articles.title: WASM 3.0 Completed
articles.summary: WebAssembly 3.0 completed; expected to impact performance, portability, tooling, and ecosystem growth across runtimes.

articles.title: A postmortem of three recent issues
articles.summary: Anthropic engineering postmortem examining three incidents, detailing root causes, remediation, and process improvements.

articles.title: One Token to rule them all – Obtaining Global Admin in every Entra ID tenant
articles.summary: Security discussion about attacker tokens that could grant global admin across Entra ID tenants and corresponding mitigations.

articles.title: Alibaba's new AI chip: Key specifications comparable to H20
articles.summary: Alibaba announces a new AI chip with specs compared to Huawei H2O; explores architecture, memory, compute, and use cases.

articles.title: Hypervisor 101 in Rust
articles.summary: Introductory guide to building a hypervisor in Rust, covering virtualization concepts, safety, and implementation trade-offs.

articles.title: Towards a Physics Foundation Model
articles.summary: ArXiv paper proposing physics-informed foundations for scalable models and potential benefits for reliability and scientific modeling.

articles.title: Understanding Deflate
articles.summary: Overview of the Deflate compression algorithm, its typical use cases (gzip/zip), and practical guidance.

articles.title: Republicans are honoring Charlie Kirk’s memory by declaring war on the First Amendment
articles.summary: Policy analysis on Republicans framing Charlie Kirk’s influence within free-speech debates and regulatory responses.

articles.title: Upending Precedent, Thune Bows To Realities of a Polarized Senate
articles.summary: Analysis of Senator Thune’s use of a nuclear option and its implications for minority rights and Senate norms.

articles.title: Democrats Outline Spending Demands as Shutdown Looms
articles.summary: Democrats propose more than $1 trillion in health spending amid looming government shutdown and budget negotiations.

articles.title: Eerste negen partijen aan het woord geweest bij Prinsjesdagdebat
articles.summary: Overview of the opening day of Prinsjesdag debates, with nine parties speaking and others to come.

articles.title: Brits on Trump visit: Americans should not come and stoke things
articles.summary: British reaction to Donald Trump’s visit, analyzing diplomatic signaling and public sentiment.

articles.title: American central bank begins very cautiously easing rates, but not as much as Trump wants
articles.summary: Report on the Fed’s cautious rate-cut approach amidst political pressure from Trump.

articles.title: Veertien uur debatteren: hoogtepunten van de eerste dag beschouwingen terug
articles.summary: Highlights from the first day of the budget debate in the Dutch parliament, with party positions and questions.

articles.title: Ilhan Omar censure fails to pass in shock House vote
articles.summary: Censure motion against Ilhan Omar fails in a closely watched House vote amid partisan tensions.

articles.title: Scoop: Dems launch South Texas ad blitz with Latino voters
articles.summary: Democratic campaign ads targeting Latino voters in South Texas; outlines messaging and potential impact.

articles.title: Here’s Who Attended the State Dinner at Windsor Castle
articles.summary: Guest list and seating for Windsor Castle’s state dinner honoring President Trump; discusses diplomatic optics.

articles.title: Windsor Castle’s State Dinner Features Lavish Menu
articles.summary: Details of the state dinner menu and its symbolic diplomacy in U.K.–U.S. relations.

articles.title: Hong Kong’s Beloved Dim Sum Carts Fade Into the Past
articles.summary: Hong Kong’s dim sum carts fade as rents rise and new formats emerge, changing culinary culture.

articles.title: Litouwen stelt dat Rusland achter DHL-bompakketjes zat
articles.summary: Lithuania alleges Russia's involvement in the DHL bomb-package case amid international security concerns.

articles.title: Syrian foreign minister visits D.C. to lobby for lifting of last sanctions
articles.summary: Syria’s foreign minister meets U.S. officials to push for sanctions relief and humanitarian considerations.

articles.title: Eric Baker’s long, winding road to taking StubHub public
articles.summary: TechCrunch profiles Eric Baker and the path toward StubHub’s public listing, highlighting strategy and milestones.

articles.title: Nvidia AI chip challenger Groq raises even more than expected, hits $6.9B valuation
articles.summary: Groq secures funding with a $6.9B valuation; discusses position in the AI chip market.

articles.title: Irregular raises $80 million to secure frontier AI models
articles.summary: Irregular raises funding to access and deploy frontier AI models for enterprise use.

articles.title: U.S. investors, Trump close in on TikTok deal with China
articles.summary: Investors by Trump-era administration discuss regulatory and governance terms for a TikTok deal with China.

articles.title: Democrats launch South Texas ad blitz with Latino voters
articles.summary: Campaign ads targeting Latino voters in South Texas; outlines messaging and potential electoral impact.

articles.title: Ajax besprak verdedigen van corners uitvoerig, toch maakt Inter er twee: Megafrustrerend
articles.summary: Ajax’s defensive corners analysis; Inter scores twice, described as frustrating.

articles.title: Van Dijk schenkt jarige Slot late zege op Atlético, ook PSG en Bayern winnen
articles.summary: Van Dijk’s late goal leads to a win against Atlético; PSG and Bayern also win their matches.

articles.title: Joke Bruijs groeide op in een mannenwereld leerde het vak op het biljart
articles.summary: Obituary profiling Joke Bruijs’s career in Dutch theater and television, noting her influence and Parkinson's disease.

articles.title: De eerste souvenirs: wat de Engelse adel in Italië kocht, is nu te zien in het Mauritshuis
articles.summary: Exhibition of 17th-18th century English aristocrat souvenirs at Mauritshuis, reflecting cultural exchange.

articles.title: Top Scientists See Growing Proof That Greenhouse Gases Threaten Human Health
articles.summary: National Academies assessment finds greenhouse gases threaten human health with policy implications.

articles.title: Towards a Physics Foundation Model
articles.summary: ArXiv entry exploring physics-informed foundation models and methodologies.

articles.title: Moe, hoofd- of buikpijn: 1 op de 3 vrouwen verbergt hormonale klachten op werk
articles.summary: Roughly one in three working women hide hormonal complaints; discusses impact on productivity and well-being.

articles.title: CBS: een op drie vrouwelijke werknemers verzwijgt hormoongerelateerde klachten op werk
articles.summary: CBS findings corroborate the sharing-tendency of hormonal complaints among female workers and its implications for equality and productivity.

articles.title: 3 Police Officers Are Killed in Shooting in Southern Pennsylvania
articles.summary: Three police officers killed and two injured in York County; shooter dead; investigation ongoing.

articles.title: Mexico rolt bende op die miljoenen liters brandstof smokkel
articles.summary: Authorities bust a gang smuggling millions of liters of fuel; impact on safety and economy.

articles.title: U.S. investors, Trump close in on TikTok deal with China
articles.summary: Investors discuss terms and regulatory considerations for a potential TikTok deal with China.

articles.title: What Jimmy Kimmel said about Charlie Kirk's killing
articles.summary: Coverage of Kimmel’s remarks about Charlie Kirk’s death and ensuing controversy.

introText: This digest covers technology and AI developments, major geopolitical events including the Gaza conflict and US-China tech tensions, and economics and markets. It also highlights Dutch politics and notable cultural obituaries.

categories.commentary: Technology product news, AI, robotics, and software updates.

articles.title: The iPhone 17 is the one to get this year
articles.summary: The Verge argues the standard iPhone 17 offers a compelling balance of speed, battery life, and value, with improvements to display and energy efficiency, making it a strong option relative to Pro and Air variants.

articles.title: The iPhone 17 Pro is a bold redesign but a basic upgrade
articles.summary: The iPhone 17 Pro features a design refresh and stronger hardware but remains a modest upgrade over the previous generation, with questions about whether new features justify the price for everyday use.

articles.title: Meta’s new smart glasses are coming this week
articles.summary: The Verge previews Meta’s upcoming smart glasses, outlining expected hardware features and software integration within Meta’s AR strategy ahead of Meta Connect 2025.

articles.title: How to watch Mark Zuckerberg’s keynote at Meta Connect 2025
articles.summary: This explainer covers scheduling and streaming options for Meta’s Connect 2025 keynote and what audiences might expect from product announcements.

articles.title: Waymo to launch a robotaxi service in Nashville in 2026
articles.summary: Waymo plans to launch a robotaxi service in Nashville by 2026, discussing potential rider experience considerations, regulatory hurdles, and partnerships.

articles.title: Sony’s PS5 update adds controller swapping and Power Saving mode
articles.summary: The PS5 software update introduces controller swapping and a Power Saving mode, with implications for energy efficiency and daily use.

articles.title: The Apple Watch SE 3 is the one to buy
articles.summary: The Apple Watch SE 3 is presented as the strongest value in Apple’s wearables, offering good battery life and everyday usability at a lower price point.

articles.title: Casio’s stress-relieving furry robot MOFLIN is coming to the US
articles.summary: Casio’s MOFLIN furry robot, designed as a stress-relief companion, will be available in the United States.

articles.title: iPhone Air review: The thinnest iPhone ever, but at what cost?
articles.summary: The iPhone Air is described as the thinnest iPhone yet, with a design trade-off between extreme slenderness and practicality, prompting questions about the trade-offs involved.

articles.title: iPhone 17 Pro review: How pro can you go?
articles.summary: Hands-on testing of the iPhone 17 Pro and Pro Max assesses whether the Pro models deliver meaningful enhancements in speed and power and whether they justify flagship status.

articles.title: Here are all the new features in iOS 26, iPadOS 26, macOS Tahoe
articles.summary: Apple has published official feature lists across iOS 26, iPadOS 26, and macOS Tahoe, directing readers to the documentation for full details.

articles.title: Kuo: Apple to launch touch screen Macs, starting with OLED MacBook Pro
articles.summary: Ming-Chi Kuo says Apple plans touchscreen Macs, beginning with an OLED MacBook Pro, with production timing potentially slipping beyond 2026.

articles.title: After years of touchscreen Mac rumors, here’s why I believe the latest one
articles.summary: Opinion discusses why the latest touchscreen Mac rumor warrants consideration, noting a history of prototypes since 2008 and ongoing experimentation.

articles.title: On iOS 26 with a T-Satellite plan? These six iPhone apps work via satellite
articles.summary: iOS 26 enables six iPhone apps to operate via satellite, with no need to select T-Mobile as the carrier.

articles.title: Car Keys in Wallet are about to launch for these three vehicle brands
articles.summary: WWDC notes car keys in Wallet would roll out to 13 brands; the first three brands are expected to launch soon.

articles.title: Apple Vision Pro gains support for digital prism correction
articles.summary: Vision Pro adds digital prism correction in visionOS 26, improving accessibility for prescription users.

articles.title: Terra Oleo’s oil-producing microbes could replace destructive palm oil plantations
articles.summary: Terra Oleo explores microbe-based oil production as a substitute for palm oil to reduce deforestation and biodiversity loss, outlining technical and regulatory considerations.

articles.title: Silicon Valley bets big on environments to train AI agents
articles.summary: The piece analyzes the rise of synthetic or simulated environments for training AI agents, discussing benefits for rapid experimentation and potential limitations in real-world transfer.

articles.title: Gemini tops the App Store thanks to new AI image model, Nano Banana
articles.summary: Gemini's Nano Banana AI image model boosts App Store performance, with analysis of AI-generated imagery affecting app engagement.

articles.title: Lyft and Waymo are partnering to bring robotaxis to Nashville
articles.summary: Lyft and Waymo announce a partnership to deploy robotaxis in Nashville, with pilots, safety considerations, and timing details.

articles.title: Icarus raises $6.1M to take on space’s “warehouse work” with embodied-AI robots
articles.summary: Icarus secures $6.1 million to pursue embodied-AI robotics for space-based warehousing tasks, outlining technology and roadmap.

articles.title: Groww, backed by Satya Nadella, set to become first Indian startup to go public after U.S.-to-India move
articles.summary: Groww aims to go public as part of a broader cross-border investment shift, with implications for Indian fintech and the startup ecosystem.

articles.title: Google I/O 2025 live coverage: Google AI Ultra, Project Mariner, Gemini app updates, and more
articles.summary: Live coverage of Google I/O 2025 highlights announcements including Google AI Ultra, Project Mariner, and Gemini app updates.

articles.title: The 9 most sought-after startups from YC Demo Day
articles.summary: TechCrunch profiles nine startups deemed most sought-after from YC Demo Day, summarizing their focus and traction.

articles.title: Robinhood plans to launch a startups fund open to all retail investors
articles.summary: Robinhood announces a startups fund accessible to all retail investors, outlining structure and potential impact on startup fundraising.

categories.commentary: Domestic and international political developments, policy debates, and political campaigns.

articles.summary: Liveblogting over the Miljoenennota with ongoing debate on mortgage interest deduction and coalition negotiations.

articles.summary: Parliament notes the stikstofpakket is missing from Prinsjesdagstukken, signaling potential further proposals and compromises.

articles.title: Wilders kritisch over migratie, partijen verwijten hem gebrek aan daadkracht

articles.title: In de rij voor een baan bij vreemdelingenpolitie ICE: 'Ik wil de wet helpen handhaven'

categories.commentary: Global conflicts, diplomacy, sanctions, and major cross-border issues.

articles.title: Netanyahu and an Israel Without Restraint
articles.summary: Analysis argues Netanyahu has pursued an uncompromising stance as the Gaza assault intensifies, with implications for diplomacy and humanitarian access.

articles.summary: Israel conducts heavy bombardment in Gaza City amid rising civilian risk and a new temporary evacuation route being opened.

articles.title: Israel’s Assault on Gaza City Stifles Hope of Diplomatic Resolution to War
articles.summary: An analysis argues that continued military pressure complicates diplomacy and risks entrenching positions on both sides.

articles.title: European Commission wants sanctions on Israeli ministers and Hamas leaders
articles.summary: EU plans targeted sanctions affecting trade benefits under Israel's association agreement and signals a firm stance amid the Gaza crisis.

articles.title: China bans Nvidia chips
articles.summary: China reportedly prohibits Nvidia chips used for AI development, affecting major tech firms and signaling broader US-China tech competition.

articles.title: Akkoord tussen VS en China over verkoop TikTok aanstaande
articles.summary: Talks in Madrid progress toward finalizing the US-China sale of TikTok, signaling a potential breakthrough in digital governance and security concerns.

articles.title: Navalny's widow says he was poisoned, contradicting Kremlin
articles.summary: Navalny's widow asserts poisoning as the cause of his death, challenging the Kremlin's official account and increasing international scrutiny.

articles.title: Ditching AUKUS will 'cause grave damage' in Indo-Pacific, says McCaul
articles.summary: U.S. lawmaker warns that scrapping AUKUS would damage Indo-Pacific security and alliance credibility.

articles.summary: Ursa pursues space defense with a Draper engine deal, outlining strategic implications for space capabilities.

articles.summary: Obituary commemorates Robert Redford's impact as an actor, director, and producer, highlighting his influence on independent cinema and philanthropy.

articles.title: Actrice Joke Bruijs (1952-2025) overleden, onder andere bekend van 'Toen was geluk heel gewoon'
articles.summary: Obituary confirms Dutch actress Joke Bruijs's death at 73, noting her contributions to theatre, film, television, and music.

categories.commentary: Policy, climate, and energy transition news.

articles.title: Al Gore on China’s climate rise: ‘I would not have seen this coming’
articles.summary: Al Gore comments on China's climate trajectory, noting unexpected developments with policy implications and global energy transition considerations.

articles.title: Het kabinet trekt in 2026 bijna één miljard uit voor de offshore windsector
articles.summary: Dutch government plans nearly €1 billion in 2026 subsidies to offshore wind sector to support energy transition.

articles.title: Waarom energie-transitie down but not out
